name: Emacs Wiki - black
description: real simple changes: black background, contrasting lighter font color, the links' colors are changed a little bit to help them contrast and all of the sections have a slightly different color background like the original
additional_info:
Version 1.2 removes "www." from the domain.

Version 1.1 condenses my previous approach to the link colors and, more importantly, lightens the blue links that didn't contrast very well against the almost-black background.
